name: singularity

conflicts.name: platform=darwin
conflicts.description: singularity: singularity requires a Linux VM on Windows & Mac

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularity)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: go
dependencies.description: The golang compiler and build environment

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description: Placeholder package for Apple's analogue to non-GNU libuuid

dependencies.name: libgpg-error
dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.

dependencies.name: git
dependencies.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.

dependencies.name: shadow
dependencies.description:
Tools to help unprivileged users create uid and gid mappings in user
namespaces.

dependencies.name: cryptsetup
dependencies.description: Cryptsetup and LUKS - open-source disk encryption.

dependent_to.name: openmpi
dependent_to.description:
An open source Message Passing Interface implementation. The Open MPI
Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that
is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and
industry partners. Open MPI is therefore able to combine the expertise,
technologies, and resources from all across the High Performance
Computing community in order to build the best MPI library available.
Open MPI offers advantages for system and software vendors, application
developers and computer science researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-spython
dependent_to.description: The Python API for working with Singularity containers.

dependent_to.name: singularity-hpc
dependent_to.description:
Local filesystem registry for containers (intended for HPC) using Lmod
or Environment Modules. Works for users and admins.
